APP.TITLE: Worker Support
APP.NO_INSTRUCTOR_MESSAGE: You haven't selected any display for this browser. This meens that we can't show you any instructions on this screen.

WORKER_INSTRUCTIONS.FAILED_LOADING: The connection to the server could not be established. Please check your network connection or try again later.
WORKER_INSTRUCTIONS.EMPTY_STATE_TEXT: Done! We reach out to you again, when there is something to be done.

DEFAULT_MESSAGE: Something went wrong on the server.
SERVER_NOT_REACHABLE: The server is unreachable, please check your internet connection or proxy settings.
